details: ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME II + ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME III EAU DE PARFUM 2X100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).A collection of fragrances to give the finishing touch to your outfit, whether elegant, sophisticated or bold. Providing a dark and intoxicating touch at night, and during the day unveiling lively and magnetic notes.NIGHT POUR HOMME II, a modern oriental fougère where seductive and warm spices are intermingled with notes of dry woods for an intoxicating trail. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity notes of bergamot, grapefruit and lemon wrapped in cardamom, lavender and nutmeg. In the background we find musky and vanilla notes accompanied by cedar wood, amber and tonka bean. A provocative fragrance for the man who defends his carefree personality.NIGHT POUR HOMME III, a woody fragrance that reveals an elegant and fresh character with an iridescent floral explosion. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity notes of bergamot and pear, wrapped in iris, osmanthus, coriander and pepper. In the background we find woody notes of sandalwood and cashmere accompanied by leather and vetiver notes. A unique, seductive and irresistible trail.View more

details: ZARA INTENSE VIBRANT LEATHER EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). A RICH SCENT WITH INTENSITY ACCORDS“Vibrant Leather Intense is the perfect combination between the unique and fruity notes of bamboo and the sensuality of papyrus and sandalwood.” Jérôme Epinette, perfumer of Vibrant Leather. Woody eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals citrus notes of bergamot and lemon, black pepper, Schinus Molle, elemi, geranium and bamboo.
